TopicTitle: searching For a Mod with Part - Micro Leg Radial

Articles.Content:
Chaps

I'm trying to get an old save-game going but I'm having trouble with one last mod that I can't find. My only clue is that it features a part called 'Micro Leg Radial'. I know what it looked like: it was a small jagged looking black landing strut with tiny yellow highlights. Does anyone have any idea as to what mod this part belongs to?

Yes - I've already sifted through the my savegame's loader section but can't see anything obvious.

Any ideas???

Spanx 

 

R x

I figured it out - it was Transparent Commend Pods. Phew! 

Game on......

Mods please feel free to delete this most as its now redundant
